channel.title: Python Fonts Fractals on Pantaloche

item.title: Attempting to improve on serif fonts
item.description: My favourite typeset letter is serif lowercase g. If you compare all typeset letters with how you would write them by hand, the weird standout by far is the g. Maybe the a is also a bit weird, but I know a few people that write the a in the same way as in serif text. The t, l, i have slight flourishes, but nothing compared to the g. Let’s take a look
